price: ''Hurma ağacını kendine doğru silkele ki, sana taze hurma dökülsün.''
arabic: وَهُزِّيٓ إِلَيۡكِ بِجِذۡعِ ٱلنَّخۡلَةِ تُسَٰقِطۡ عَلَيۡكِ رُطَبٗا جَنِيّٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wahuzzī ilayki bijidh'ʿi al-nakhlati tusāqiṭ ʿalayki ruṭaban janiyyan
